Planning To Enter Video Game Industry (Switching Careers)

Apr 16, 2016

A few days ago, I received message from Game Department of NetEase, which told me my resume is passing through. Since I’d been working on game-related projects for some time (spanning 3 years now), it is the first time I get the formal external confirmation of my skills and experience for game programming.

I think it is happening.

While I am still aware of deficiency of mine in some major Computer Science subject and I don’t have a major in Computer Science, that is not a huge obstacle for me now.
